findings.rationale: The absence of an indemnity clause may expose parties to liability without protection against third-party claims related to the disclosed information.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution, after which the obligations shall terminate.

findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to disputes regarding what constitutes confidential material.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information includes all proprietary information, trade secrets, business plans, financial data, and technical information disclosed by either party.

findings.rationale: The three-year duration for confidentiality obligations may not be sufficient for certain sensitive information that requires longer protection.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution, after which the obligations shall terminate.

findings.rationale: The contract does not outline specific consequences or remedies for breach of confidentiality, which could lead to unaddressed violations.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party agrees to maintain the confidentiality of the other party's Confidential Information.
